description: Build billing UI that displays credit usage, remaining credits, and upgrade prompts when limits are reached

acceptanceCriteria: Current usage is displayed (900 for free, 5000 for business)
Display format is clear: 'X / Y credits used'
Progress bar or visual indicator is shown
Display format: 'X credits remaining this month'

subtasks.description: Show upgrade button when free limit is reached
acceptanceCriteria: Button links to Autumn checkout page
Checkout page is for '$19/mo Business Plan'

subtasks.description: Display Business Plan features on billing page
acceptanceCriteria: Billing page shows: 'Pay-As-You-Go overage: $0.01 per credit ($10 per 1,000 credits)'
Billing page shows: 'Priority queue access included'
features: Pay-As-You-Go overage: $0.01 per credit ($10 per 1,000 credits)

subtasks.philosophy: Organization-level credit pool forces teams to collaborate and manage usage together, creating natural upgrade pressure when limits are reached

acceptanceCriteria: Credit usage and limits are displayed clearly
Upgrade button appears when free limit is reached
Upgrade button links to Autumn checkout
Business Plan features are clearly listed
implementationNotes: Make upgrade prompts compelling but not pushy
Show value of Business Plan clearly
Use progress bars or visual indicators for credit usage
Update UI in real-time when credits are used
Consider showing usage trends or history
